nodes.text: This starship, a Recusant-class light destroyer, served in the Confederate Navy during the Clone Wars.

This starship participated in the Battle of Sullust, where it was commanded by the T-series tactical droid TJ-912. Count Dooku, leader of the Confederation used this battle in an attempt to assassinate his disciple Asajj Ventress, and ordered TJ-912 to fire upon the Separatist command ship that Ventress was on and withdraw from the system. The tactical droid complied with the order, and this starship was used to destroy the command ship; Ventress, however, escaped.
